Module Hierarchy

  • pytils: Simple processing for russian strings
    • dt: Russian dates without locales
    • numeral: Plural forms and in-word representation for numerals.
    • test: Unit tests for pytils
      • test_dt
      • test_numeral
      • test_translit
    • translit: Simple transliteration

Class Hierarchy

  • __builtin__.object: The most base type
    • unittest.TestCase: A class whose instances are single test cases.
      • pytils.test.test_numeral.ChoosePluralTestCase
      • pytils.test.test_dt.DistanceOfTimeInWordsTestCase
      • pytils.test.test_numeral.GetFloatRemainderTestCase
      • pytils.test.test_numeral.InWordsTestCase
      • pytils.test.test_numeral.RublesTestCase
      • pytils.test.test_dt.RuStrftimeTestCase
      • pytils.test.test_numeral.SumStringTestCase
      • pytils.test.test_translit.TranslitTestCase
    • __builtin__.type: type(object) -> the object's type type(name, bases, dict) -> a new type
  • exceptions.Exception: Common base class for all exceptions.
    • exceptions.StandardError: Base class for all standard Python exceptions.
      • exceptions.AssertionError: Assertion failed.
